author: Bjarne Stroustrup
title: The C++ Programming Language
description: The classic introduction to C++ by its creator.

author: Scott Meyers
title: Overview of the New C++
description: These are the presentation materials (slides and some lecture notes) of a three-day training course offered by Scott Meyers, who's a highly respected author on C++. Even though the list of items is short, the quality is high.

author: Nicolai Josuttis
title: C++ Standard Library Tutorial and Reference
description: The introduction and reference for the C++ Standard Library.

author: Bjarne Stroustrup
title: The Design and Evolution of C++
description: If you want to know why the language is the way it is, this book is where you find answers
